activities: DNA tests for genealogy and anthropology purposes
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On and off-line records and databases.
privacyprograms: We adhere to the privacy requirements advocated by ISOGG - International Society of Genetic Genealogy and to BBB EU Safe Harbor
recoursemech: ISOGG, European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) and BBB EU Safe Harbor
